resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

from.name: from
from.description: The name or number the message should be sent from
from.ai_hint: The name or number the message should be sent from

to.name: to
to.description: The number that the message should be sent to. Numbers are specified in E.164 format.
to.ai_hint: The number that the message should be sent to. Numbers are specified in E.164 format.

message.name: message
message.description: The body of the message being sent
message.ai_hint: The body of the message being sent

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: account-ref
options.description: An optional string used to identify separate accounts using the SMS endpoint for billing purposes. To use this feature, please email support@nexmo.com.

options.name: callback
options.description: The webhook endpoint the delivery receipt for this sms is sent to. This parameter overrides the webhook endpoint you set in Dashboard.

options.name: client-ref
options.description: You can optionally include your own reference of up to 40 characters

options.name: message-class
options.description: The Data Coding Scheme value of the message

options.name: protocol-id
options.description: The value of the protocol identifier to use. Ensure that the value is aligned with udh.

options.name: status-report-req
options.description: Whether to receive a Delivery Receipt

options.name: ttl
options.description: By default Nexmo attempt delivery for 72 hours

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
